page.title: 12Credits
page.content: The data for this block was compiled, edited,typed, by the following people: The teachers and pupils of Carsington & Hopton C.E.Primary School,especially Daniel Griffiths aged 9 for "A day in the life of..." Lorna Mackenzie aged 9 for "My School"and Paul Povey aged 11 for "Life on the Farm". The following people, all of whom live in Carsington and Hopton, made contributions to this project: Mr&Mrs. Parkin, The Glebe House,Carsington. Mr.Hutchinson, Etate House, Hopton. Mrs.Cochrane, Town End House, Hopton. Mrs.Brown, Garden House, Carsington. Mrs.Springall, Town End Cottage, Carsington and her son Andrew Springall.
